info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 1:49AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern La Porte and Berrien Counties through 215 AM EDT/115 AM CDT/... At 147 AM EDT/1247 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Lake Michigan Beach to near Stevensville to Long Beach. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Michigan City, Benton Harbor, St. Joseph, Buchanan, Fair Plain, Benton Heights, Bridgman, New Buffalo, Berrien Springs, Watervliet, Three Oaks, Coloma, Long Beach, Stevensville, Shorewood-Tower Hill, Paw Paw Lake, Shorewood-Tower Hills-Harbert, Lake Michigan Beach, Dayton and Sodus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 196 between mile markers 0 and 7. Interstate 80 in Indiana near mile marker 50, and between mile markers 54 and 61. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 42 and 45. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
